Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-43806 affecting package cloud-hypervisor for versions less than 32.0-7
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-43806 affecting package cloud-hypervisor for versions less than 32.0-7. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package cloud-hypervisor is earlier than 32.0-7, affected by CVE-2024-43806
